articles.title: Kim Jong Il gives on-site guidance to Jagang Province
Kim Jong Il's start of work at WPK C.C. celebrated in Russia
Korean-Russian cooperation in science and technology
Film show hosted by Foreign Ministry
articles.content:
Korean-Russian cooperation in science and technology
   Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- A protocol of the 3rd meeting of the scientific and technological cooperation sub-committee of the Inter-Governmental Trade, Economic and Scientific and Technological Cooperation Committee of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Russian Federation was signed in Moscow on June 11.
Present at the ceremony were Kim Ho Hyon, vice-president of the Academy of Sciences, Pak Ui Chun, Korean ambassador to Russia, on the DPRK side and vice Minister of Science and Technology of Russia Yuri Yudintev and officials concerned on the opposite side.
   The protocol was signed by Kim Ho Hyon and Yuri Yudintev.

articles.title: Greetings to South African President
articles.content:
Film show hosted by Foreign Ministry
    Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs sponsored a film show here on Wednesday to mark the 35th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea.
   Invited to the show were diplomatic envoys of different countries and resident representatives of international organizations in Korea.   
   Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun was present.
   The participants saw the Korean documentary film "the Respected Comrade Kim Jong Il Is the Great Thinker and Theoretician."

articles.title: Foreigners visit exhibition of works on Juche idea
articles.content:
Greetings to South African President
   Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Thabo Mbeki on Tuesday upon his election as President of South Africa.
   In the message Kim Yong Nam extended his congratulations to him and expressed the belief that the friendly relations between the two peoples of the DPRK and South Africa would expand and develop in conformity with the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
   He wished the South African President success in his work for peace, stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il is supreme incarnation of national character
articles.content:
Foreigners visit exhibition of works on Juche idea 
   Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) -- Diplomatic envoys of different countries and representatives of international organizations in Korea visited the exhibition of works on the Juche idea here on Wednesday on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea.
   On display at the exhibition are immortal works, pictures and writings of Kim Jong Il which show his ideological and theoretical achievements.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Japan's unbridled militarist measure
Merry Tano festival
Kim Il Sung praised as military genius
Committees for remembering Kim Il Sung formed abroad
Seminar on Juche idea held in Peru
S. Korean unionists' strike
Korean dance
articles.content:
S. Korean unionists' strike
   Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) --  More than 24,000 unionists under the Federation of South Korean Trade Unions Wednesday went on a general strike for limited hours to protest against the prosecution's  "inducement to strike" of the mint company  trade union, according to a radio report from Seoul.   
   The general strike followed a "national  rally  of workers for practicing general strike"  with the attendance of over 10,000 unionists in Seoul.
   Cadres of the South Korean Confederation of Trade Unions  who were on a hunger strike in Seoul from June 14 called for probing the  truth behind the "inducement to strike" and dissolving the "Council for Public Security" and declared that they  would go on a strike from June 17 and hold protest rallies across South Korea.

articles.title: Definite end to outsiders in Kosovo called for
Basket of flowers from Palestinian President
Choe Thae Bok meets Bangladesh delegation
articles.content:
Basket of flowers from Palestinian President 
   Pyongyang, June 17 (KCNA) - General Secretary  Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Yasser Arafat, president of the state of Palestine, on the occasion of the 35th anniversary of his start of work at the Central Committee of the Worker's Party of Korea.   The floral basket was handed to Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun today by Shaher Mohammed Abdlah, Palestinian Ambassador E.P. to Korea.
